Plot: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.
Title: Unforgiven
Actors: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman, Richard Harris
tomatoConsensus: As both director and star, Clint Eastwood strips away decades of Hollywood varnish applied to the Wild West, and emerges with a series of harshly eloquent statements about the nature of violence.
